contactForm.title: Contact Us
contactForm.description: We are available for questions, feedback, or collaboration opportunities. Let us know how we can help!

faqs.question: What is BuildmeCV?
faqs.answer: BuildmeCV is an AI-powered resume builder that helps you create professional resumes in minutes.

faqs.question: Is BuildmeCV free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan with basic features. We also have premium plans with advanced features.

faqs.question: What templates are available?
faqs.answer: We offer a variety of templates, including modern and classic designs, to suit different industries and roles.

faqs.question: Can I customize the templates?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize the colors, fonts, and layout of your resume to match your personal brand.

faqs.question: How does the AI assistant work?
faqs.answer: Our AI assistant helps you write compelling resume content by providing suggestions for your summary, experience, and skills sections.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. Your data is encrypted and stored securely.
